short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access product and company sales data while browsing the internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See whether a website is included in Particl's database at a glance. 

This extension detects domains and products that Particl has additional analytics on and can show them in the extension popup for Particl customers.

Link directly to more powerful dashboards in the Particl app, straight from the extension.
